metadata.title: CVE-2017-12166 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.3.3 and 2.4.x before 2.4.4 are vulnerable to abuffer overflow vulnerability when key-method 1 is used, possibly resultingin code execution.

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
